reviewText: Read the details carefully. I bought my copy from a Spanish distributer expecting a visually perfect print and it was...But the subtitles were not in English. Turns out English isn't available on ANY copies on Amazon, only French and Spanish. I'd seen it many times and knew the story, each character, and it's outcome, but the subtleness in the acting and dialogue isn't detectable. Maybe Amazon has corrected this by now. Read the details carefully.
